content:
It's even more fun than making crafts before,
you absolutely have to try it~!
{me}Have you tried making any cute little trinkets at the crafting table?

Imagine having a crafting table,
where every item in your home is made by your own hands.
Wouldn't that make you love coming home even more?

After getting used to the pace of life here,
Don't you find inspiration comes more easily?

A brilliant idea that can be brought to life at the workbench,
This feeling is absolutely amazing.
